name: Node-climagic
body:
### Here is what you need to do :

``` npm install climagic ```

~~~
> cli=require('./climagic.js')
  { cmd: [Function] }       
> cli.cmd()
> while true; do date; printf "\033[A"; sleep 1; done
~~~
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
